name: places/ChIJRemks1lYwokR6zmIXnolZuM
adrFormatAddress: 860 9th Ave #2, New York, NY 10019-4449, USA

editorialSummary.text: Local mainstay stocking liquor & a diverse wine selection along with a variety of tastings.

originalText.text: It is a nice place, they serve quickly and you can pay in cash or card. Good variety of wines and spirits. You are served warmly and by an expert.

text.text: It is a nice place, they serve quickly and you can pay in cash or card. Good variety of wines and spirits. You are served warmly and by an expert.

originalText.text:
Get ready to have your debit card cloned!!! It happened to me. I went there late on a weeknight (when other liquor stores in the area were closed) .. paid way too much for a bottle. And it was the ONLY time I used my debit card that eve. Okay whatever.
And this place and location is in an area where I do not live. Skimmer scam alert!!!
Then, my bank informs me, two days later, that my debit card was used to withdraw funds at an atm CLOSE BY THAT SAME AREA) SEVERAL TIMES, hourly, two days following in the early AM hours and also requested a balance inquiry on my account. My bank was smart (üôèüèª) enough to see something was strange here. Slimy. Good luck. Pay in cash when purchasing here (even if way overpriced) and you‚Äôll be better off than having your money disappear. Shame on you and i now know why you never made eye contact with me.

originalText.text: We walked into this store on 10/24/21 Sunday at 8:55pm. We were greeted (not greeted) by an elderly gentleman barking at us that we have "2 MINUTES" "2 MINUTES"  (they close at 9pm) Being so rudely treated at onset I should have walked out. But I decided to ask for help so that we could hurry the purchase along as requested. After advising him what we were looking he hurried back to the back cooler only to tell us "no we have nothing like that" Upon asking for an alternative he was flustered that I would consider spending his time (now we probably only had a minute left) an associate stepped in and pointed to the alternative, feeling pressured we took it (it wasn't very good). I went to grab it he took it and said no I got it, practically ran to the register to check me out. I will NEVER go back again and I should have never left my money there in the first place I'm in customer service and though your store may close the customers inside at the time before closing are serviced with gratitude for  their  business. Very rude workers !!!

originalText.text: Great selection. Excellent service. Extremely knowledgeable and helpful in finding the perfect wine pairing for the right meal. Even let me come in a few minutes after closing and offered wonderful suggestions and explanations. Highly recommend.

text.text: Great selection. Excellent service. Extremely knowledgeable and helpful in finding the perfect wine pairing for the right meal. Even let me come in a few minutes after closing and offered wonderful suggestions and explanations. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Excellent wine shop with some wines I knew, some new ones I tried, and helpful suggestions from the staff. Not the biggest store, but definitely worth checking out for wine you don‚Äôt see everywhere else.
